name: highflier
content:
highflier noun
(PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] (mainly UK high-flyer) someone who has a lot of ability and a strong wish to be successful and is therefore expected to achieve a lot: Highfliers in the industry typically earn 25 percent more than their colleagues.

highflier noun
(ORGANIZATION)
[ C, + sing/pl verb ] mainly UK an extremely successful organization, business, or team
